title: Giving a shop demonstration
brief_description: An example of good teaching practise in the school workshop and materials are assembled in preparation for the class; a demonstration by the instructor precedes practical work by students; the instruction demonstrates and explains proper methods to be used; questions are asked by the teacher and the students during the course of the work.
